title: 【月轻歌搬运】鹰巢城城堡The Eyrie Castle
author: 月轻歌
txt_content:
大家好，我是月轻歌~

那么有一段时间没出来搬运了，啊啊，电脑坏了嘛~

现在电脑成功恢复，我又重新出来了233

话不多说，进入正题！

————————————————

本次搬运的地图是：鹰巢城城堡The Eyrie Castle
原帖：点我
                                                               图片：
                                                             




































介绍：鹰巢城堡是一个古老的建筑，他横跨了月亮山，被誉为坚不可摧的城堡。本地图是根据一部电视游戏而制作的。

原文：
The Eyrie is the ancient seat of House Arryn. It is situated in the Mountains of the Moon astride the peak known as the Giant's Lance, several thousand feet above the valley floor below. It's considered impregnable to attack." 


This is a 1:1 interpretation of the Eyrie, as depicted on the Game of Thrones TV show. It's a massive castle, suspended in the air atop a huge land arch, within the centre of a massive mountain range. It's the closest you'll get outside of WesterosCraft.  

The Eyrie includes all your favourites, the Moon Door, Sky Cells, Gods Wood etc. At the entrance to the mountain range you'll also find the Bloody Gate. There's a lot to explore, there's even a donkey trail leading from the Bloody Gate to the steps of the castle, but there's still quite a lot that hasn't been finished yet.  

This thing stretches from 0 to 256 height limit, so be prepared to lower the ground level if you want to see it in full.  


In the downloads, you'll find a link to the Eyrie schematic, and a link to the whole map, which also includes the mountains + Bloody Gate.  




——————————————————
下载地址：点我~

——————
咳咳，不觉的该给我点人气么
